problem.p: [mathjaxinline]\binom {n}{n/3}[/mathjaxinline] is approximately [mathjaxinline]2^{cn}[/mathjaxinline] for some constant [mathjaxinline]0<c<1[/mathjaxinline]. (Here â€œapproximately" means up to factors of at most [mathjaxinline]O(n)[/mathjaxinline].)
What is [mathjaxinline]c[/mathjaxinline] up to three digits of precision?
